segments.text: I'm just watching this woman, and it's making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate while her kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's living in her own little bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring over the counter onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can she not feel her foot getting wet in that puddle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just unbelievable how calm she looks amidst all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are making a complete mess of things with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy could fall and break his arm any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she paying any attention to anything at all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness here is genuinely infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach in and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR
